meanings.definition: Bring (goods or services) into a country from abroad for sale.
meanings.sent1: The company is reimporting products to sell in our country.
meanings.sent2: She reimports items from other nations to make a profit.
meanings.sent3: The store owner joked about reimporting chocolates for a sweet deal.
meanings.sent4: He reimports happiness from distant lands to share with everyone.
meanings.sent5: Reimporting brings new opportunities and flavors to our market.

meanings.definition: Bring (goods or services) back into a country after they have been exported.
meanings.sent1: We are reimporting the machinery for further use in our factories.
meanings.sent2: The company reimports the raw materials to complete the production process.
meanings.sent3: The team celebrated by reimporting the winning trophy for display.
meanings.sent4: She reimports memories of her childhood to cherish in her hometown.
meanings.sent5: Reimporting old traditions can revitalize a community.
